Rewrite prompt:
Design a landing page for a new smartphone product. The landing page should include a t-shirt design with an announcement of the new smartphone. 
Here are the requirements for the landing page:
- The page should have a header with the product name and a call-to-action button to learn more about the product.
- The t-shirt design should have an eye-catching image of the new smartphone and a catchy slogan that promotes the features of the product.
- The landing page should have a section that highlights the key features of the new smartphone, such as the camera quality, battery life, and storage capacity.
- The page should also have a section that includes customer reviews and testimonials about the new smartphone.
Can you design the HTML code for this landing page, including the t-shirt design with the announcement of the new smartphone product?
